resources.string: After the update, Samsung apps can be updated to the latest available version.
Getting ready to restart…\nThis may take several minutes.
Unable to update the software. A network or server error occurred. Try again later.
Connect to a Wi-Fi network to continue downloading the update.
The downloaded software update will be deleted after %s. If you don\'t install the update before it\'s deleted, you\'ll need to download it again.
Charge your battery to at least %d%% to continue the update.
Mobile data used to download this update won\'t count against your data plan.
Connect to a Wi-Fi network to download the update.
Downloading this update over a mobile network may result in extra charges.
Using mobile data to download may result in additional charges. Using Wi-Fi is recommended.
Your device was disconnected from the network before the download was complete. The download will continue when your device reconnects to a network.
Your phone was disconnected from the network before the download was complete. The download will continue when your phone reconnects to a network.
Your tablet was disconnected from the network before the download was complete. The download will continue when your tablet reconnects to a network.
Your phone is now connected to Wi-Fi.
Your tablet is now connected to Wi-Fi.
Try again later or update using Smart Switch on your computer.
The update package has not been downloaded completely. Mobile networks are available. Downloading via a mobile network may result in additional charges. If possible, download via a Wi-Fi network.
The server has reached its daily download limit. Try again tomorrow or update using %1$sSmart Switch%2$s on your computer.
The maximum file size for downloading via a mobile network (%d MB) has been exceeded. Connect to a Wi-Fi network instead.

This update will be automatically installed on %1$s at %2$s.\n\nYour phone will restart after the update is installed. After restarting, you won\'t receive notifications from some apps until you unlock your phone.
This update shouldn\'t affect your personal data, but it\'s always a good idea to back up your data just in case.
You won\'t be able to use your device during the update.
You won\'t be able to use your phone during the update.
You won\'t be able to use your phone during the update, even for emergency calls.
You won\'t be able to use your tablet during the update.
You won\'t be able to use your tablet during the update, even for emergency calls.
Some settings may change after the update.
Your device will restart after the update is installed.
Your phone will restart after the update is installed.
Your tablet will restart after the update is installed.
There\'s no information about this update.
Your software is up to date.
Your current software version isn\'t supported. Visit a service centre.
Try updating using Smart Switch on your computer or contact a docomo shop.
Try updating using Smart Switch on your computer or contact an au shop or PiPit.
Try updating using Smart Switch on your computer or contact Customer Service.
There was a problem downloading the update. Try again later.
Update will be automatically installed on %1$s at %2$s.
To install this update, you need %s more free space in your device\'s internal storage. Free up some space by uninstalling apps or deleting files, then try again.
To install this update, you need %s more free space in your phone\'s internal storage. Free up some space by uninstalling apps or deleting files, then try again.
To install this update, you need %s more free space in your tablet\'s internal storage. Free up some space by uninstalling apps or deleting files, then try again.
After you set a time to install, you won\'t be able to change it.
Your device\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using Smart Switch on your computer or visit a Customer Service location.
Your device\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using Smart Switch on your computer or visit an au shop or PiPit store.
Your phone\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using %1$sSmart Switch%2$s on your computer or contact Customer Service.
Your phone\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using %1$sSmart Switch%2$s on your computer or contact a docomo shop.
Your phone\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using %1$sSmart Switch%2$s on your computer or contact an au shop or PiPit.
Your tablet\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using %1$sSmart Switch%2$s on your computer or contact Customer Service.
Your tablet\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using %1$sSmart Switch%2$s on your computer or contact a docomo shop.
Your tablet\'s operating system has been modified in an unauthorised way. Try updating using %1$sSmart Switch%2$s on your computer or contact an au shop or PiPit.
Network not available. Try again later.
If you pause the update, verification will start again from the beginning when you resume.
Restart your device to finish the update
Almost done! Restart your phone to finish the update.
Restart your tablet to finish the update
While roaming, software updates can only be downloaded over Wi-Fi. Connect to Wi-Fi to download the update.
Software can\'t be downloaded while roaming.
While roaming, you can only check for updates using Wi-Fi.
Software updates are controlled by your organisation. Contact your IT administrator for more information.
An unknown error has occurred. If this problem persists, restart the device.
Feel free to use your phone while the update is being installed. You\'ll get a notification when it\'s time to restart to finish the update.
Your device will automatically restart on %1$s at %2$s to complete the update.
To finish the update, your device will automatically restart on %1$s at %2$s.\n\nAfter restarting, you won\'t receive notifications from some apps until you unlock your device.
To finish the update, your phone will automatically restart on %1$s at %2$s.\n\nAfter restarting, you won\'t receive notifications from some apps until you unlock your phone.
To finish the update, your tablet will automatically restart on %1$s at %2$s.\n\nAfter restarting, you won\'t receive notifications from some apps until you unlock your tablet.
Your phone will automatically restart on %1$s at %2$s to complete the update.
Your tablet will automatically restart on %1$s at %2$s to complete the update.
Connect your phone to your computer using a USB cable, then open Smart Switch on your computer.
Connect your tablet to your computer using a USB cable, then open Smart Switch on your computer.

Download and install Smart Switch on your computer.

Windows:
https://www.samsung.com/global/download/smartswitchwin/

MacOS:
https://www.samsung.com/global/download/smartswitchmac/
If a software update is available for your phone, you\'ll be prompted to install it.
If a software update is available for your tablet, you\'ll be prompted to install it.
When the update is complete, your phone will restart.
When the update is complete, your tablet will restart.
How to update using Smart Switch
Double tap to switch to calendar view.
Double tap to switch to Day-Month-Year view.
